Macro BOOST_UNITS_REQUIRE_LAYOUT_COMPATIBILITY

BOOST_UNITS_REQUIRE_LAYOUT_COMPATIBILITY

Synopsis

BOOST_UNITS_REQUIRE_LAYOUT_COMPATIBILITY

Description

If defined will trigger a static assertion if quantity<Unit, T> is not layout compatible with T
